result.execSummary:
The defendant Stephen L. Vaughn was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Stephen L. Vaughn is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Stephen L. Vaughn was found guilty of Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
With huber privileges.  Jail to commence on or before Nov. 21, 2016.  Provide DNA Sample.
Consecutive to: to any other sentence

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Stephen L. Vaughn

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Stephen L. Vaughn in court with attorney Puck Tsai.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  No Contest Plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court finds Def. guilty.  Court imposes sentence.

Count 1:
$443.00 costs, 60 days to pay or set up a payment plan.  BOND TO BE APPLIED
30 Days in Sauk County Jail, with huber, consecutive.  Commence on or before Nov. 21, 2016 @ 6:00 PM
Provide DNA Sample
EMP authorized

Counts 2-3: Dismissed
Paperwork handed in court.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 22, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Tsai doesn't know why DE isn't here.  Requests reset to next week so he can talk to DE again as matter is resolved.  State requests warrant.  Court resets.  Bond continued.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 22, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 14, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Tsai request reset.  Defendant had transportation issues.  Auth on file.  State notes previous reset and request warrant be stayed, however issued today.  Court sets for 1 p.m. tomorrow.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 14, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference on August 5, 2016 at 11:00 am.
Return date on September 13, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Stephen L. Vaughn in court with attorney Puck Tsai.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE resident of IL.  Not resolved but requests another PTC and RD.  State objects.  Court removes from trial calendar.  Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 5, 2016 at 11:00 am.  Return date scheduled for September 13, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Jury trial on August 2, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Final pre-trial on July 25, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Stands Mute, Court enters Not Guilty Plea, set for trial.  Bond continues.

Pre-trial conference on May 6, 2016 at 10:30 am.
Return date on May 20, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Stephen L. Vaughn in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant would like to be represented.  Defendant appeared a bit late for PTC and still was not able to speak with ADA Hoffman.  Needs to appear with PD office to see if he qualifies.  Court instructs to go to PD Office and go from there with next step for court appointed counsel.  Set for PTC/RD.  Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 6, 2016 at 10:30 am.  Return date scheduled for May 20, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference at 04-01-2016 11:00 am.
Return date at 04-12-2016 01:00 pm.

Defendant Stephen L. Vaughn in court.  Linda Ann Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE showed at PTC and requested an atty.  Reset PTC and RD. Advised right to atty.  Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 1, 2016 at 11:00 am.  Return date scheduled for April 12, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference at 02-19-2016 11:45 am.
Return date at 03-02-2016 01:00 pm.

Defendant Stephen L. Vaughn in court.  Dennis Joseph Ryan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  Advised rights to an attorney, waived.  File set for pre-trial conference/return date.  Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 19, 2016 at 11:45 am.  Return date scheduled for March 2, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
